title: Quality improvement.
summary: Quality improvement in health care is a structured analysis of a health-care system with a view to improving its performance. This review describes the history of quality improvement and its growing application in health care. It gives further informat â€¦
abstract: Quality improvement in health care is a structured analysis of a health-care system with a view to improving its performance. This review describes the history of quality improvement and its growing application in health care. It gives further information for doctors wanting to participate.
